price: Hindi sumampalataya bago nila ang isang pamayanan na ipinahamak Namin. Kaya sila ba ay sasampalataya?
arabic: مَآ ءَامَنَتۡ قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآۖ أَفَهُمۡ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: mā āmanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknāhā afahum yu'minūna
